statements: SELECT * FROM packaging_information;
SELECT product_name, packaging_type FROM packaging_information;
SELECT id, packaging_material, compliance_status FROM packaging_information;
SELECT * FROM packaging_information WHERE safety_standard = 'ISO 9001';
SELECT id, product_name FROM packaging_information ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_information WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, packaging_type FROM packaging_information WHERE packaging_material = 'Plastic';
SELECT * FROM packaging_information WHERE packaging_type = 'Box' AND compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT id, product_name, packaging_material FROM packaging_information WHERE safety_standard LIKE '%ISO%' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, packaging_type, safety_standard FROM packaging_information WHERE packaging_material = 'Paper' AND compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_specifications ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT product_name, package_type, package_material FROM packaging_specifications WHERE package_size > 100;
SELECT * FROM safety_standards WHERE product_category='Electronics' AND compliance_status='Approved';
SELECT product_name, safety_rating FROM safety_standards ORDER BY safety_rating ASC;
SELECT product_name, package_type, package_size FROM packaging_specifications WHERE package_material='Cardboard';
SELECT product_name, package_type, package_size FROM packaging_specifications WHERE package_material = 'Plastic' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, package_type, package_size FROM packaging_specifications WHERE package_size > 100 ORDER BY package_size DESC;

SELECT product_name, package_material, safety_rating FROM packaging_specifications ps INNER JOIN safety_standards ss ON ps.product_name = ss.product_name WHERE ss.compliance_status = 'Compliant' ORDER BY safety_rating DESC;

SELECT ps.product_name, ps.package_type, ss.product_category FROM packaging_specifications ps LEFT JOIN safety_standards ss ON ps.product_name = ss.product_name WHERE ss.safety_rating >= 4 ORDER BY ps.product_name ASC;

SELECT ps.product_name, ps.package_size, ss.safety_rating, ss.compliance_status FROM packaging_specifications ps INNER JOIN safety_standards ss ON ps.product_name = ss.product_name WHERE ss.product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY ps.package_size ASC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_specifications;
SELECT product_name, weight FROM packaging_specifications WHERE weight > 10;
SELECT dimensions, weight, product_name FROM packaging_specifications WHERE product_name LIKE 'Product%';
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports WHERE safety_standard_id = 1 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT packaging_id, submitted_by FROM compliance_reports WHERE packaging_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND submitted_by IS NOT NULL ORDER BY packaging_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_specifications ORDER BY weight DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, dimensions FROM packaging_specifications WHERE weight > 10;
SELECT s.standard_name, cr.report_date FROM safety_standards s JOIN compliance_reports cr ON s.id = cr.safety_standard_id WHERE cr.report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT ps.product_name, ss.standard_name FROM packaging_specifications ps JOIN compliance_reports cr ON ps.id = cr.packaging_id JOIN safety_standards ss ON cr.safety_standard_id = ss.id;
SELECT MAX(weight) AS max_weight, AVG(weight) AS avg_weight FROM packaging_specifications;
SELECT * FROM packaging_specifications;
SELECT id, product_name, weight FROM packaging_specifications WHERE weight > 5;
SELECT product_name, packaging_material, expiry_date FROM packaging_specifications ORDER BY expiry_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports WHERE is_compliant = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM inspection_records WHERE inspection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM packaging_specifications ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, weight FROM packaging_specifications WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY weight ASC;
SELECT packaging_material, COUNT(*) as total_count FROM packaging_specifications GROUP BY packaging_material HAVING total_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM safety_standards WHERE description LIKE '%packaging%';
SELECT ir.inspection_date, ir.result, cr.inspector_name FROM inspection_records ir JOIN compliance_reports cr ON ir.report_id = cr.id WHERE cr.is_compliant = true ORDER BY ir.inspection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_specifications;
SELECT id, package_weight FROM packaging_specifications ORDER BY package_weight DESC;
SELECT product_id, package_dimensions FROM packaging_specifications WHERE product_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM safety_standards WHERE category = 'Food';
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM packaging_specifications ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, package_weight, package_dimensions FROM packaging_specifications WHERE package_weight > 100;
SELECT * FROM safety_standards WHERE category = 'Packaging';
SELECT id, report_date, compliance_status FROM compliance_reports WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY report_date DESC;

SELECT packaging_reports.report_id, packaging_reports.packaging_spec_id, packaging_specifications.package_weight FROM packaging_reports INNER JOIN packaging_specifications ON packaging_reports.packaging_spec_id = packaging_specifications.id;
